item.title: Badger41 and friends
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

They’re cheating, I’m pretty sure about it. This notion is also supported by the fact that one of his close companions who helps him was caught xraying (death). I’m not even going to explain why I think they’re all cheating just go to W1 and look at his properties. If they’re not xraying they’re using instant block breaking for sure.

@Moparisthebest: He has ~25 chests under residence in one area, and hundreds hidden, can you check them if I PM you coords?

PS please don’t say this is me trying to get xx matty xx enemies in trouble, matty has pretty much left this community now and I don’t talk to him anywhere else there is no communication between us.

Read full topic
